#summary Tracking OLAC participation by providers

= Guidelines =

Guidelines for using the issue tracker to document progress in OLAC participation for this provider.

  * *New* the provider is a potential OLAC participant
  * *Accepted* there is an email from the provider confirming their intention to participate in OLAC (specify date of email and surname of correspondent)
  * *Fixed* the repository is listed on the archives page as being 1.1-conformant
